name: SUNOKTE
description:
For some reason, you find yourself locked in a room where you only see the few lights that still exist in this world, and you will seek at all costs to get out of this dungeon but for that you will need the key to our world. 

Gameplay: 

A puzzle platform game in which your objective is to get out of the very dark universe in which Mogo finds himself. Grabbing and repositioning elements of the stage to achieve your escape. 

Controls:

Arrows for movement, "X" to jump and "Z" to grab objects on the stage. 

This protector was made for a jam, so the content is reduced and may contain some error, if you find one, report it here :3.
